name: PyroPixel
description:
Welcome to PyroPixel, a sandbox based pyromaniac game.

PyroPixel is a game about burning things down.

Use your limited resources and tools in order to burn down the houses in the neighbourhood, but try to destroy the trees as well for an extra score! 

The game supports both mouse and keyboard as well as xbox controllers currently.

How it started:
Originally created as an assignment, The game was centered around using different tools in different ways to burn down all the houses in a neighbourhood.  The initial concept was supposed to be voxel based, but this fell outside the scope of using unity and thus the burning and destruction is limited in this build. 

If any of you have good resources about voxel engines or other methods of destruction, id be glad to add it to my list of resources.
